EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to PostalManager when Lead is created
EmailTemplate.name: RetailSMB_LeadCreated_PostalManager
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Contacting Australia Post
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name_of_lead_creator__c}
Thank you for submitting a new lead and taking part in the Small Business Engagement program. Your lead is currently going through our verification process, and we’ll let you know if it’s been verified or not. The reference number is {!Lead.Lead_Number__c}.
We will contact the customer shortly.
Thank you,
Australia Post
